attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: I came on here to see 1 good reason to vote for this terrible man but I couldn’t find 1 REASON! I will NEVER recommend this app to ANYONE and I will NEVER use this app ever AGAIN!!! THIS APP WILL BE DELETED IMMEDIATELY!!!!!! I was expecting better on our new president, he was even tear gassing his own people!

attributes.title: Anyone else 2020
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then the entire year of 2020 began...seems a little suspicious. Also caused my phone to contract a virus after the download, I’m getting it tested but they think it might be corona.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: apparently this app is for racist over privileged ignorant people ?? would have been nice to know before i downloaded the app. also adds for sketchy tanning salons keep coming up. idk what up with that.

attributes.title: Hispanic and black lives matter
attributes.review: The app took 5 weeks to download and when it did download it glitched out and made me get really bad migraines to the point where I had to go to the hospital.

attributes.title: We ain’t fw racist🤩🤩
attributes.review: Donald trump is disgrace to the male gender he has said  very questionable things about the females. Also is a very ignorant man due to the spread of Covid-19 being his fault and lacking any leadership skills to lead this country. Who ever votes for this man is a racist and a very ignorant person

attributes.title: I hate this app!!
attributes.review: I counted on this app to give me all the weekely news and what’s going on with our president!!!! And when I flicked on the news on my TV it was completely wrong from what our president had said . DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: horrible app for a horrible president
attributes.review: I downloaded this trying to find hope in our president. Little did I know that it's just a bunch of crazy republicans and pictures.

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: The quality is awful it took a long time to load and this app is just a waste of time no one get it it’s not even worth your storage space

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: This is made my phone crash and I now have to buy an entire new one. It won’t delete from my phone and has also caused some horrible rashes
